summary: When a Princess escapes her entourage to explore New York City over Christmas, she meets a young man who shows the beautiful stranger his side of the city.
cast: Briana Evigan|Paul Campbell|Greg Evigan|Jacqueline Samuda|Jay Brazeau|Beverley Elliott|Tara Wilson|Casey Manderson|Tony Alcantar|Fiona Vroom|Kayden Magnuson|Peter Ciuffa|Al Miro|Sunita Prasad|Billy Mitchell|Mike Wasko|Drew Ray Tanner|Dee Jay Jackson|Marcus Hondro|J.C. Williams|John Hainsworth|Andrew Suttar
title: Unas vacaciones de cuento
